    • Method Detail

      • addSignatureContainer

        public java.io.File addSignatureContainer(FileStream fileStream)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Add signature container to the file-system. Add increment number before the extension when file with the same name already exists.
        Parameters:
        fileStream - Stream to write.
        Returns:
        File that was eventually written into.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When file cannot be created for some reason.
        See Also:
        generateSignatureContainerFile(String)

      • generateSignatureContainerFile

        public java.io.File generateSignatureContainerFile(java.lang.String name)
                                            throws java.io.IOException
        Generate signature container file. Add increment number before the extension when file with the same name already exists. Example "file_name (1).ext".
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the container file with extension.
        Returns:
        File with absolute path pointing to generated name.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When something fails.

      • findSignatureContainerFiles

        public com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<java.io.File> findSignatureContainerFiles()
        Get all signature container files currently cached on the device. The files are sorted by modified date.
        Returns:
        File objects for signature containers.

      • cache

        public java.io.File cache(FileStream fileStream)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Add file stream to local cache.
        Parameters:
        fileStream - File stream to cache.
        Returns:
        File with absolute path pointing to generated cache.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When something fails.

        public java.io.File getContainerDataFilesDir(java.io.File containerFile)
